titleStmt.title: Long Lent, 1685 or A vindication of the feasts, against those three great horned beasts, John Forbes, Master Duncan Lidel, with his son George to tune their fidle. To the tune of Robin-Hood and the tanner.
titleStmt.author: Forbes, John, fl. 1685.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Forbes, printer in Aberdeen, by National Library of Scotland.
Two images of sheet at this location; first copy contains top half of sheet only.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
